summaries.veryShort: Weekend stance: bullish bias, watching FDX, GDX, DB, XLB, SPY, TSLA, NVDA, QQQ for follow-through over the next few weeks.
summaries.mainIdea: Risk tone was mixed: breadth 48% up / 51% down / 1% flat, VIX 13.6 (+1.0%), top10 concentration 67% of $vol, breakouts 6 up / 1 down (20/55/252d). Volatility was muted (median 1d move 0.1 ATR; ≥1 ATR: 2; ≥2 ATR: 0). Top setups: XPEV sell.
